item.title: Foreign leaders react to former President Jimmy Carter's death
item.description: World leaders have offered their condolences after the death of former President Jimmy Carter at the age of 100.

item.title: What those who volunteered with Jimmy Carter for Habitat for Humanity say about him
item.description: Jimmy Carter's legacy lives on through Habitat for Humanity, says those who volunteered with him.

item.title: Linda Lavin, Tony-winning Broadway actress who starred in sitcom ‘Alice,’ dies at 87
item.description: Linda Lavin, a Tony Award-winning stage actress who became a working class icon as a waitress on the TV sitcom “Alice,” has died at age 87
